name: Buffalo Cauliflower Buddha Bowl
description: Spicy roasted buffalo cauliflower paired with fresh spinach, chickpeas, grain of your choosing and topped with a drizzle of cashew cream sauce.
recipeIngredient: 1 large head cauliflower, chopped into bite sized pieces
2 cups raw cashews, soaked in hot water for at least 5 minutes
4-5 cups cooked brown rice, quinoa or farro

itemListElement.text: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Prepare a large roasting pan by lining it with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
itemListElement.name: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Prepare a large roasting pan by lining it with parchment paper or a silicone mat.

itemListElement.text: In a small bowl, whisk together the almond flour, water, salt and garlic powder.
itemListElement.name: In a small bowl, whisk together the almond flour, water, salt and garlic powder.

itemListElement.text: Dip the cauliflower florets, one by one,  in the batter and place on the pan.
itemListElement.name: Dip the cauliflower florets, one by one,  in the batter and place on the pan.

itemListElement.text: Bake for 15 minutes. Remove from oven and shake them around a little bit. Brush the cauliflower with most of the Frank's Red Hot Sauce. Bake for another 10-15 minutes, until the sauce looks absorbed and they are somewhat crispy, but not burned. Remove from oven and set aside.
itemListElement.name: Bake for 15 minutes. Remove from oven and shake them around a little bit. Brush the cauliflower with most of the Frank's Red Hot Sauce. Bake for another 10-15 minutes, until the sauce looks absorbed and they are somewhat crispy, but not burned. Remove from oven and set aside.

itemListElement.text: While the cauliflower is roasting, make your cashew cream sauce and prepare all the bowl ingredients.
itemListElement.name: While the cauliflower is roasting, make your cashew cream sauce and prepare all the bowl ingredients.

itemListElement.text: To a high powered blender, add the soaked and drained cashews, fresh water, garlic powder, onion powder and salt. Blend on high until very smooth.
itemListElement.name: To a high powered blender, add the soaked and drained cashews, fresh water, garlic powder, onion powder and salt. Blend on high until very smooth.

itemListElement.text: In a bowl for each person, add about 1 cup of whatever cooked grain you're using, 1/4-1/2 cup chickpeas, a handful of baby spinach, some buffalo cauliflower, and top with a drizzle of cashew cream. May also drizzle additional red hot sauce on top if you like. Serve!
